item.title: Android internal Notes
item.description: File system Android devices typically have a partitioned storage system, where the storage is divided into different partitions, each serving a specific purpose. /system: This directory contains the Android operating system and system applications. It is read-only to ensure the integrity of the system. Modifying files in this directory could potentially harm the device. /app: prebundled apps from Google, as well as any vendor or carrier-installed apps /bin: various daemons, as well as shell commands contain bootanimation,dalvikvm, adb, etc.
